Journal

  2. Haining Wang, and Zhi Ding, "Macrocell-queue-stabilization-based power control of femtocell networks," IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, vol. 13, no.9, Sept, 2014. DOI:10.1109/TWC.2014.2329852

Conference
